name: Hazel the Birthday Bot
description: A bot that reminds the chat about a person's birthday

skills.name: Hazel the Birthday Bot
skills.description: Allows a user to store their birthdays and reminds the chat when it's their birthday

parts.text: I'll remember your birthday! What's the date?
